1996.info: Mobile phones and SMS enter the mainstream

2001.info: "Panarchy: Understanding Transformations in Systems of Humans and Nature"by Lance Gunderston & C.S. Holling

2005.info: Kyoto Protocol enters into force, UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) COP10
CBA1: First conference on community-based adaptation to climate change
Hurricane Katrina, a category 5 event, makes landfall on the Gulf Coast of the US
Government of Ethiopia launches the Productive Safety Net Programme (PSNP)
Hyogo Framework for Action led by UN Office for Disaster Risk Reduction (UNISDR)

2006.info: TREND: Influx of funds after the Indian Ocean tsunami, Katrina and Haiti, which spurs further work and dialogue around disaster resilience and allows more disaster risk reduction with a focus on resilience
Joint evaluation of the international response to the Indian Ocean tsunami, Tsunami Evaluation Coalition

2007.info: Asian Cities Climate Change Resilience Network (ACCCRN) established
Ecosystems and Livelihoods Adaptation Network (ELAN) established by IUCN and WWF
"Characteristics of a Disaster-resilient Community: A Guidance Note" by John Twigg
"Measuring household resilience to food insecurity: Application to Palestinian households" by FAO
